clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of TQ-B3234 in Patients With Type I Neurofibromatosis
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of TQ-B3234 Capsules in Chinese Patients With Type I Neurofibromatosis (Neurofibromatosis and Malignant Peripheral Nerve Sheath Tumors)

lead_sponsor.agency: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock:
This study is a Phase I clinical trial to evaluate the tolerability and pharmacokinetics of TQ-B3234 capsules in Chinese subjects associated with neurofibromatosis type I (neurofibroma and peripheral malignant neurilemmoma).
Two study phases were designed, including (1) dose escalation and (2) cohort expansion.
The purpose of this study was to evaluate the tolerance, pharmacokinetic characteristics, efficacy and safety of TQ-B3234 capsule, and to explore the therapeutic biomarkers related to this product.

primary_outcome.description: If DLT occurs in 2 or more subjects in a given dose group, the dose level in the previous dose group is considered MTD
Some drug-related toxicities occurred within 28 days of treatment
Percentage of participants achieving complete response (CR) and partial response (PR).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before administration, 10 , 20 , 30, 45 minuets, 1 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 10 , 24 , 48 , 72 hours after administration
Before administration, 10 , 20 , 30, 45 minuets, 1 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 10 , 24 , 48 , 72 hours after administration
Before administration, 10 , 20 , 30, 45 minuets, 1 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 10 , 24 , 48 , 72 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: The time required for the concentration of a drug to fall by half in a living organism

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before administration, 10 , 20 , 30, 45 minuets, 1 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 10 , 24 , 48 , 72 hours after administration
Pre-dose of day 1, day 8, day 15, day 28 on multiple dose and 10 , 20 , 30 , 45 minutes,1 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 10 , 24 hours post-dose on multiple dose of day 1 and day 28

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma concentration at steady state (Cav, SS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose of day 1, day 8, day 15, day 28 on multiple dose and 10 , 20 , 30 , 45 minutes,1 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 10 , 24 hours post-dose on multiple dose of day 1 and day 28
secondary_outcome.description: The plasma concentration at which the rate of administration and rate of elimination are in equilibrium

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under plasma concentration-time curve at steady state (AUCss)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose of day 1, day 8, day 15, day 28 on multiple dose and 10 , 20 , 30 , 45 minutes,1 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 10 , 24 hours post-dose on multiple dose of day 1 and day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Area under plasma concentration-time curve at steady state

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose of day 1, day 8, day 15, day 28 on multiple dose and 10 , 20 , 30 , 45 minutes,1 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 10 , 24 hours post-dose on multiple dose of day 1 and day 28

secondary_outcome.description: The occurrence of all adverse events (AE), serious adverse events (SAE) and treatment-related adverse events (TEAEs)
PFS defined as the time from randomization until the first documented progressive disease (PD) or death from any cause.
The time when the participants first achieved complete or partial remission to disease progression.
The proportion of patients whose tumor shrank or remained stable for some time, including those with complete response (CR), partial response (PR), and stable (SD).
Rate of patients with PFS reaching 1 year among all patients

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall survival time (OS, observed only in peripheral malignant schwannomas)
secondary_outcome.description: The time between the start of treatment and death directly due to the disease.

secondary_outcome.measure: Effects on pain score in subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire: pain score：The line segments below all have numbers from 0 to 10, where 0 means no pain and 10 is the worst pain you can imagine.

secondary_outcome.measure: Effects on subjects' health-related quality of life
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire: Quality of life related scale（The European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire 3rd edition）.For questions 1 to 28, choose a number from 1 to 4. 1 means none and 4 means very.For questions 29 and 30, choose a number from 1 to 7, with 1 being very poor and 7 being very good.
Patients' overall impression of severity of cancer symptoms (self-reported)

secondary_outcome.measure: Effects on pain interference index in subjects
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire: pain interference index：Please answer each one by circling a number from 0 to 6, where 0 means none at all and 6 means completely

arm_group.description: In the dose escalation phase, enrolled subjects first received a single dose on an empty stomach for a 3-day observation period. If Dose limiting toxicity (DLT) did not occur, continuous multiple doses were continued, once a day on an empty stomach for a treatment cycle of 28 days. After the dose escalation phase was completed, cohort extension studies were conducted according to the identified phase ii clinical recommended doses.type I neurofibromatosis （NF1） patients and malignant peripheral nerve sheath tumors （MPNST） patients were selected.

intervention.description: TQ-B3234 is an anti-tumor molecular targeted drug, which is a selective Mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase（MEK）1/2 inhibitor

facility.name: Shanghai Ninth People's Hospital ，Shanghai JiaoTong University School of Medicine
